programme.desc: Excitement and goals are what football is all about and the Bundesliga has really come up trumps on both counts in 2023/24, with Bayer 04 Leverkusen knocking serial champions Bayern Mnchen off their long-established perch in what is, once again, Europes top-scoring top league.\nIn good time before UEFA Euro 2024 kicks off in Germany, this special report rounds up the very best of the many Bundesliga goals netted nationwide over the course of the campaign. programme.title: Bundesliga Special 2023/24 - Top Goals
programme.desc: Excitement and goals are what football is all about and the Bundesliga has really come up trumps on both counts in 2023/24, with Bayer 04 Leverkusen knocking serial champions Bayern Mnchen off their long-established perch in what is, once again, Europes top-scoring top league.\nIn good time before UEFA Euro 2024 kicks off in Germany, this special report rounds up the very best of the many Bundesliga goals netted nationwide over the course of the campaign. Fulminating free-kicks and long-range rockets, mixing pure power with easy elegance; goals from potential stars at the upcoming Euros; and goals highlighting the mental resilience that helped Leverkusen to their first league title. With, o.

programme.title: Match 3 - Day 10 - Roland Garros 2024 - Philippe Chatrier Court
programme.desc: The 2024 Roland Garros is the 128th edition of the French Open overall. Within the Open Era, which began in 1968, the 2024 edition is the 57th edition. The event takes place from May 26 to June 9, 2024. This iconic clay-court championship features top players from around the world competing for glory in singles, doubles, and mixed doubles categories. As always, Roland Garros promises intense competition and unforgettable moments in the world of tennis.\n\n.

programme.title: Roland Garros 2024
programme.desc: The 2024 French Open is a Grand Slam tennis tournament to be played on outdoor clay courts. It will be held at the Stade Roland Garros in Paris, France, from 20 May to 9 June 2024, comprising singles, doubles and mixed doubles play. Junior and wheelchair tournaments are also scheduled. It will be the 123rd edition of the French Open and the second Grand Slam event of 2024. The main singles draws will include 16 qualifiers for men and 16 for women out of 128 players in each draw. Novak Djokovic is the defending champion in men's singles. He will be contending for a record-extending 25th Grand Slam. Iga witek is the defending champion in the women's singles.

programme.title: Roland Garros 2024
programme.desc: The 2024 French Open is a Grand Slam tennis tournament to be played on outdoor clay courts. It will be held at the Stade Roland Garros in Paris, France, from 20 May to 9 June 2024, comprising singles, doubles and mixed doubles play. Junior and wheelchair tournaments are also scheduled. It will be the 123rd edition of the French Open and the second Grand Slam event of 2024. The main singles draws will include 16 qualifiers for men and 16 for women out of 128 players in each draw. Novak Djokovic is the defending champion in men's singles. He will be contending for a record-extending 25th Grand Slam. Iga witek is the defending champion in the women's singles.

programme.title: Ligue 1 End of Season Awards 2023/24
programme.desc: Mbappe, 25, picked up the prize for the best player in Ligue 1 at the UNFP (French players' union) Trophies gala for the fifth time in a row after a season in which he has scored 44 goals in all competitions for PSG.\nPSG's domestic dominance was reflected in the other awards, with teenage midfielder Warren Zaire-Emery named young player of the season and Gianluigi Donnarumma the best goalkeeper.\nEric Roy of Brest was named coach of the year after leading the modest Brittany club to European qualification for the first time in their history -- with one game left they are guaranteed to finish at least fifth, meaning a Europa League place at worst.

programme.title: Spirit of Sport 2024
programme.desc: In this months Spirit of Sport, relive one of the biggest nights in sport with highlights from the 2024 Laureus World Sports Awards at the iconic Palacio de Cibeles in Madrid. After scoring the winning goal in El Clasico, Jude Bellingham won the Laureus World Breakthrough of the Year. Spanish midfielder, Aitana Bonmati repeated the double won by Lionel Messi last year as she took home both the Laureus World Sportswoman of the Year and Laureus World Team of the Year Awards. Novak Djokovic was awarded the Laureus World Sportsman of the Year statuette for a fifth time after a record-breaking year in 2023. Wheelchair tennis star Diede de Groot took home the Laureus World Sportsperson of the Y.

programme.title: Match 1 - Day 1 - Tennis ATP 250 Libema Open s-Hertogenbosch,Netherlands 2024
programme.desc: The Libema Open is one of eight tour-level events played on grass, and hosts both the men's and women's tours in the opening week of the grass-court swing. Four Dutchmen have titled at this tournament. Richard Krajicek triumphed in 1994 and '97, Sjeng Schalken clinched back-to-back wins in 2002-03, wild card Tim Van Rijthoven soared to the trophy in 2022 and Tallon Griekspoor claimed the crown in 2023.

programme.title: Match 1 - Day 2 - Tennis ATP 250 Libema Open s-Hertogenbosch,Netherlands 2024
programme.desc: The Libema Open is one of eight tour-level events played on grass, and hosts both the men's and women's tours in the opening week of the grass-court swing. Four Dutchmen have titled at this tournament. Richard Krajicek triumphed in 1994 and '97, Sjeng Schalken clinched back-to-back wins in 2002-03, wild card Tim Van Rijthoven soared to the trophy in 2022 and Tallon Griekspoor claimed the crown in 2023.

programme.title: Sports Clinic - World Anti Doping Agency - WADA Challenges with New Future Vision
programme.desc:
Since November 1999, when the World Anti-Doping Agency was created in Lausanne, supported by 650 sports organization including IOC and different sports international organization, WADA faced a lot of challenges. The quick development of technologies made the WADAs mission easier to catch the different cases of doping. This special episode explain the mains reasons of WADAs success and make the World of sports cleaner with a deep spirit of Olympic Charity


.

programme.desc: Brighton & Hove Albion vs Manchester United. programme.title: Manchester City vs Manchester United - Emirates FA Cup 2023/2024 - Final's
programme.desc: Manchester City vs Manchester United. This match is a repeat of last years FA Cup final, where Manchester City beat Manchester United 2-1 to complete the second part of their league title, FA Cup and Champions League treble. Its the second time in FA Cup history the same fixture has been played in the final in consecutive years, after Blackburn Rovers vs Queens Park in 1884 and 1885. Manchester City have won both Premier League meetings with Manchester United this season, beating them 3-0 at Old Trafford and 3-1 at the Etihad. The last time they beat their neighbours three times in the same campaign was in 1969-70.\n.

programme.title: Sports Clinic - World Anti Doping Agency - WADA Challenges with New Future Vision
programme.desc:

This special episode explain the mains reasons of WADAs success and make the World of sports cleaner with a deep spirit of Olympic Charity


.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Manchester United - Emirates FA Cup 2023/2024 - Final's
programme.desc: Manchester City vs Manchester United. This match is a repeat of last years FA Cup final, where Manchester City beat Manchester United 2-1 to complete the second part of their league title, FA Cup and Champions League treble. Its the second time in FA Cup history the same fixture has been played in the final in consecutive years, after Blackburn Rovers vs Queens Park in 1884 and 1885. Manchester City have won both Premier League meetings with Manchester United this season, beating them 3-0 at Old Trafford and 3-1 at the Etihad. The last time they beat their neighbours three times in the same campaign was in 1969-70.\n.

programme.title: Real Tomayapo (BOL) vs Internacional (BRA) - CONMEBOL Copa Sudamericana 2024 -MD4
programme.desc: Live and exclusive coverage from South American of the Copa Sudamericana. The competition began in 2002, replacing the separate competitions Copa Merconorte and Copa Mercosur. Since it started, the Copa Sudamericana has been a pure elimination tournament with the number of rounds and teams varying from year to year. Argentine clubs have accumulated the most victories with nine while containing the largest number of different winning teams, with seven clubs having won the title.

programme.title: Talking Football - Vicente del Bosque - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024
programme.desc:
TALKING FOOTBALL is an exclusive unique window into Spanish football and the people that have made it what it is. We dress as coaches and join their meetings and private discussions. We talk to LALIGA legends in their environment about deep issues, their successes but also their weaknesses. We would like to lead the media agenda with conversations that you do not normally hear with managers, players and the most recognizable directors. All that presented by Guillem Balague.








.

programme.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Athletic Bilbao - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38
programme.desc: Rayo Vallecano vs Athletic Club. Rayo Vallecano have won just one of their last nine meetings at Vallecas against Athletic Club in LaLiga, 2-1 in September 2014, failing to score in the last two, their worst run without scoring at home against the red and white side in the competition. Athletic Club have won nine of their last 13 LaLiga encounters with Rayo Vallecano, including the 4-0 win at San Mams in the reverse fixture, and have the chance to record the a league double against them for the fourth time in their history.\n.

programme.title: Celta Vigo vs Valencia - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38
programme.desc: Celta de Vigo vs Valencia. Celta de Vigo are winless in their last six meetings with Valencia in LaLiga, their worst winless run against them since November 2000. Valencia have won their last two away games against Celta de Vigo in LaLiga and have the chance to secure three wins in a row on Celta's home turf for the first time in the competition's history.\n.

programme.title: LaLiga Chronicles - Ep. 36
programme.desc: All the latest news and previews from the world of La Liga. La Liga Chronicles takes a look at the stories from all the teams in Spain's elite league.\n.

programme.title: Almeria vs Cadiz - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38
programme.desc: Almera vs Cdiz. This will be the fourth duel between UD Almera and Cdiz in LaLiga, with the previous three ending with the same result: 1-1. Only one meeting in the history of the competition has ended 1-1 in their first four matches: Recreativo de Huelva vs Real Betis between 2002 and 2008. UD Almera have drawn all three of their LaLiga meetings with Cdiz, making them one of three opponents they have failed to beat in the top-flight, along with Tenerife and Alavs. For their part, Almeria are the only team that Cdiz have also failed to beat in the competition.\n.

programme.title: Las Palmas vs Alaves - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38
programme.desc: Las Palmas vs Deportivo Alavs. After winning the reverse fixture this season 1-0, Las Palmas could win back-to-back top-flight matches against Alavs for the first time in their history. Alavs have scored in each of their six away games against UD Las Palmas in LaLiga, the team they have visited the most times in the competition whilst scoring in 100% of the matches.\n.

programme.title: Getafe vs Mallorca - Spanish LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 38
programme.desc: Getafe vs Mallorca. Getafe have won seven of their last eight matches at the Coliseum against Mallorca in LaLiga, losing only during this period in April 2012 with Luis Garca Plaza and Joaqun Caparrs on the respective benches. Mallorca have not lost either of their last two meetings with Getafe in LaLiga. The Balearic side have not gone three consecutive matches without defeat against Getafe in the competition since March 2008.\n.

programme.title: Almeria vs Rayo Vallecano - LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 1
programme.desc: Almera have won just one of their six games against Rayo Vallecano in LaLiga ; 3-1 at home in October 2022 last season, failing to score in four of those six matches. Rayo Vallecano have won 83% of their games against Almera in LaLiga, their highest win percentage against a single opponent with at least three games played in their top-flight history.\n.

programme.title: Sevilla vs Valencia - LaLiga 2023/2024 Week 1
programme.desc: Sevilla are unbeaten in their last eight LaLiga games against Valencia, their best run without defeat against them in their top-flight history. programme.title: Lyon vs Strasbourg - French Ligue 1 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Olympique Lyonnais vs Strasbourg. Lyon have lost two of their last three Ligue 1 matches against Strasbourg, as many as in their previous 28. OL have found the net in each of their last 26 L1 matches against Strasbourg and could equal their longest such run against a single opponent in the top-flight. After losing this fixture last season at the Groupama Stadium, Lyon could lose two consecutive Ligue 1 home games against Strasbourg for the first time since 1979.\n.

Since November 1999, when the World Anti-Doping Agency was created in Lausanne, supported by 650 sports organization including IOC and different sports international organization, WADA faced a lot of challenges. This special episode explain the mains reasons of WADAs success and make the World of sports cleaner with a deep spirit of Olympic Charity

programme.title: Reims vs Rennes - French Ligue 1 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Reims vs Rennes. Reims have lost three of their last four Ligue 1 games against Rennes, after remaining unbeaten in each of their first seven such encounters since their promotion back in the top-flight in 2018. SdR have conceded exactly three goals in each of these three defeats. 2019-20 excluded, Reims have lost each of their last three final games of a Ligue 1 season, each time at home. While Rennes are unbeaten in each of their last five such encounters in the top-flight.\n.

programme.title: Le Havre vs Marseille - French Ligue 1 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Le Havre vs Olympique Marseille. Having lost each of their last six Ligue 1 matches against Marseille, Le Havre could lose seven matches in a row against the same team in the top-flight for the first time in their history. HAC have scored just one goal in their last nine games against OM in Ligue 1, thanks to Olivier Fauconnier in September 2002. Le Havre have not beaten Marseille at home in Ligue 1 since April 30th 1988, a 1-0 win thanks to a Pascal Pain goal, going nine games without victory since ; HAC had won eight of their first 10 meetings with OM in the top-flight.\n.

programme.title: Rennes vs Metz - French Ligue 1 2023/2024 Week 1
programme.desc: This will be the fifth time that Rennes and Metz have faced each other on the opening matchday of a Ligue 1 season. Rennes have only squared off against Lille more on the opening MD with six. Metz have played two other teams more on MD1 than Rennes having met Lens eight times and Lille six times. The first meeting between Rennes and Metz in the French top-flight occurred on the very first Ligue 1 matchday on 11 September 1932. Rennes have lost just one of their last 19 encounters with Metz in Ligue 1 and are currently on a run of five consecutive wins against the Grenats - their best current winning run against an opponent in the top-flight.\n.

programme.title: Lyon vs PSG - Coupe de France 2023/2024 - Final's
programme.desc: Coupe de France 2023/2024 - Final\nLyon and Paris will face each other for the third time this season after two successes for PSG in Ligue 1, each time with a score of 4-1. Paris SG is the team against which Lyon has played the most (60 matches) and lost (28 defeats) In the 21st century (18 wins, 14 draws). OL have not won any of their last 7 matches against PSG outside Ligue 1 (6 losses and a draw leading to a defeat on penalties) but won the only previous Coupe de France final between the 2 teams , in 2008 (1-0 on a goal from Govou in overtime).

programme.desc: Marseille have lost 31 of their 67 Ligue 1 matches against Reims 46% of their matches against this opposition. programme.title: Rennes vs Metz - French Ligue 1 2023/2024 Week 1
programme.desc: This will be the fifth time that Rennes and Metz have faced each other on the opening matchday of a Ligue 1 season. Rennes have only squared off against Lille more on the opening MD with six. Metz have played two other teams more on MD1 than Rennes having met Lens eight times and Lille six times. The first meeting between Rennes and Metz in the French top-flight occurred on the very first Ligue 1 matchday on 11 September 1932. Rennes have lost just one of their last 19 encounters with Metz in Ligue 1 and are currently on a run of five consecutive wins against the Grenats - their best current winning run against an opponent in the top-flight.\n.

programme.title: Stuttgart vs Borussia M'gladbach - German Bundesliga 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Stuttgart vs Borussia M'gladbach. VfB Stuttgart are unbeaten in five Bundesliga home games against Borussia Mnchengladbach. However, after suffering defeat in the reverse fixture, Borussia Mnchengladbach could become the only Bundesliga team against whom VfB have failed win at least one point against this season. In addition, the only other teams Stuttgart have failed to win against this term are 1. FC Heidenheim and Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Last time out VfB Stuttgart celebrated their 22nd win of the season in the Bundesliga, a new club record. Their 70 points are a VfB record in a 34-match Bundesliga season tied with the 2006-07 championship season. The clubs Bundesliga record is 73 points from the 1991-92 title winning sea.

programme.title: Borussia Dortmund vs Darmstadt - German Bundesliga 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Borussia Dortmund vs Darmstadt 98. Against no side do Borussia Dortmund have a better goals-per-game average against in the Bundesliga than versus SV Darmstadt, amongst opponents they have faced at least nine times. Dortmund are still unbeaten at home against Darmstadt in the top-flight. SV Darmstadt have lost their last three Bundesliga games without scoring the Lilies are yet to suffer four defeats in a row in the Bundesliga this season and only lost four in a row without scoring in the top-flight in December 2016.\n.

programme.title: Bayer Leverkusen vs Augsburg - German Bundesliga 2023/2024 Week 34
programme.desc: Bayer Leverkusen vs Augsburg. FC Augsburg have won only two of their 25 Bundesliga matches against Bayer 04 Leverkusen, but both wins did come last season. Borussia Dortmund were the only other side to defeat Leverkusen twice in the league in the 2022-23 campaign. Against no other team in the top-flight do Augsburg have a worse points per game average against than the Werkself. Bayer 04 Leverkusen are now unbeaten in 50 consecutive matches in all competitions, extending their record in the big-five European leagues. The Werkself's last defeat came on May 27th 2023 in the Bundesliga against Bochum. Leverkusen could now become the first team ever to finish a Bundesliga season without suffering a single defeat.\n.

programme.title: Augsburg vs Borussia M'gladbach - German Bundesliga 2023/2024 Week 1
programme.desc: Borussia Mnchengladbach have won only one of their 12 Bundesliga away games at FC Augsburg, a 3-2 win in February 2020. programme.title: Sports Clinic - Ankle injuries between secured Surgery and New Methods of Treatment
programme.desc: From a simple sprain to a severe one, the cases vary from a partial disruption to a complete tear of the ligaments at the ankle level. programme.title: Al Ahly (EGY) - Esperance ST (TUN) - CAF Champions League 2023/2024 - Final 2ND LEG
programme.desc: CAF Champions League 2023/2024 - Final 2ND LEG\nThe stakes are high as both teams vie for the title, with the Egyptian giants seeking to capitalize on their home advantage against the formidable Esperance side in Cairo.\nWith the first leg ending in a goalless draw Ahly will be eager to win at home and clinch their 12th title, while the Esperance aim to surprise the home team.

programme.title: Sports Clinic - World Anti Doping Agency - WADA Challenges with New Future Vision
programme.desc:
Since November 1999, when the World Anti-Doping Agency was created in Lausanne, supported by 650 sports organization including IOC and different sports international organization, WADA faced a lot of challenges. The quick development of technologies made the WADAs mission easier to catch the different cases of doping. This special episode explain the mains reasons of WADAs success and make the World of sports cleaner with a deep spirit of Olympic Charity


.

programme.title: Match 3 - Day 10 - Roland Garros 2024 - Philippe Chatrier Court
programme.desc: The 2024 Roland Garros is the 128th edition of the French Open overall. Within the Open Era, which began in 1968, the 2024 edition is the 57th edition. The event takes place from May 26 to June 9, 2024. This iconic clay-court championship features top players from around the world competing for glory in singles, doubles, and mixed doubles categories. As always, Roland Garros promises intense competition and unforgettable moments in the world of tennis.\n\n.

programme.title: FIA Formula 4 Italy - Imola Round - Race 2
programme.desc: Is an exhilarating racing series showcasing young talent competing in single-seater cars on circuits across Italy. With its high-speed action and competitive racing, the series offers an exciting platform for drivers to hone their skills and progress in their motorsport careers.

programme.title: DTM Dekra Lausitzring - Race 2
programme.desc: The DTM, or Deutsche Tourenwagen Masters, is a top touring car racing series known for its high-speed action and fierce competition. Featuring powerful cars from Audi, BMW, and Mercedes-Benz, the DTM attracts top drivers to iconic European circuits. With thrilling battles and technical challenges, it offers fans an adrenaline-fueled experience, showcasing the best in automotive engineering and racing talent.

programme.title: Feature Race - FIA Formula 2 Championship - Monaco Round
programme.desc: The 2024 FIA Formula 2 Championship is an open-wheel racing category serving as the second tier of formula racing in the FIA Global Pathway. The category will be run in support of selected rounds of the 2024 Formula One World Championship. As the championship is a spec series, all teams and drivers competing in the championship will run the same car, the new Dallara F2 2024.

programme.title: Dekra Lausitzring - ADAC-GT4 2024 - Race 1
programme.desc: Is a thrilling racing series featuring GT4-class cars on German circuits. With diverse manufacturers and talented drivers, it offers exciting wheel-to-wheel action and close competition for fans to enjoy.\n.

programme.title: Dekra Lausitzring - ADAC-GT4 2024 - Race 2
programme.desc: Is a thrilling racing series featuring GT4-class cars on German circuits. With diverse manufacturers and talented drivers, it offers exciting wheel-to-wheel action and close competition for fans to enjoy.\n.

programme.desc: What are the most incredible stories about the Olympics\n\n.

programme.title: GOODYEAR FIA European Truck Racing 2024-Misano
programme.desc:
The matadors of the road are back with a vengeance! 1,000 horsepower and a seeming disregard for their trucks' bodywork provide fascinating action in a king-size battle royal!Set aside strategy and brace yourself for old-fashioned action and plenty of contact across 28 races in 2024!







.

programme.title: GP Confidential 2024 / Magazine
programme.desc:
Explore the sporting secrets of F1. Across 25 episodes and in crisp 3D animations, we analyses the technical details, which decide which teams make the most of the rules - and which need to go back to the drawing board. Complemented by features on historical milestones as well as race previews - GP Confidential is the perfect treat for any F1 fan.
























.

programme.title: Feature Race - FIA Formula 3 Championship - Monaco Round
programme.desc: The 2024 FIA Formula 3 Championship is an open-wheel racing category serving as the third tier of formula racing in the FIA Global Pathway. The category will be run in support of selected rounds of the 2024 FIA Formula One World Championship. As the championship is a spec series, all teams and drivers competing in the championship will run the same car, the Dallara F3 2019.

programme.title: Feature Race - FIA Formula 2 Championship - Monaco Round
programme.desc: The 2024 FIA Formula 2 Championship is an open-wheel racing category serving as the second tier of formula racing in the FIA Global Pathway. As the championship is a spec series, all teams and drivers competing in the championship will run the same car, the new Dallara F2 2024.

programme.title: Porsche SuperCup - Monaco Round - Race
programme.desc: As the international pinnacle of the Porsche one-make series, the Porsche Mobil 1 Supercup is honoured to hold its eight Rounds per season as part of Formula 1 events at circuits including Monte Carlo, Monza or Spa-Francorchamps.

programme.title: Race - FIA Formula 1 World Championship - Monaco GP
programme.desc: beIN SPORTS is the live and exclusive broadcast partners of Formula 1 until end of 2033 season. The 2024 season has a record schedule of 24 Formula 1 races for the first time, all race weekends, including every Practice, Qualifying, Sprint & Race will be live & exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Ferrari Challenge 2024 - Balaton Round - Trofeo Pirelli Race 1
programme.desc: The 2024 Ferrari Challenge at Balaton featured an exciting Trofeo Pirelli Race. Skilled drivers competed intensely on the challenging Hungarian track, highlighting strategic overtakes and skillful handling. Highlights included dramatic moments as drivers pushed their limits, underscoring Ferrari's legacy in motorsport with speed and precision.

programme.title: Ferrari Challenge 2024 - Balaton Round - CoppaShell Race1
programme.desc: The 2024 Ferrari Challenge at Balaton featured an exciting Coppa Shell Race. programme.title: Madrid Marathon Race 2024
programme.desc: The Rock 'n' Roll Madrid Marathon is a prestigious event in Spain with IAAF Gold Label Road Race status. The course starts near Paseo de Recoletos, passing landmarks like Biblioteca Nacional de Espaa and Santiago Bernabu Stadium, before finishing inside Buen Retiro Park. The event expanded globally in April 2011. The 2020 edition was canceled due to the coronavirus pandemic, with registrants offered options for entry transfers or refunds.

programme.title: Al Arabi vs Al Duhail - The Final - Handball Qatar Emir Cup Final 2024

programme.title: Al Arabi vs Al Duhail - The Final - Handball Qatar Emir Cup Final 2024
programme.desc: The Handball Amir Cup Final 2024 sees Al Arabi facing Al Duhail in a highly anticipated match. Last year's champions, Al Arabi, aim to defend their title, while Al Duhail looks to end the season with a victory. Both teams secured their spots with impressive semi-final performances; Al Duhail defeated Al Rayyan 29-26, and Al Arabi narrowly beat Al Wakrah 28-26. This final, featuring the two best teams, promises to be a tough and exciting game.

programme.title: Madrid Marathon Race 2024
programme.desc: The Rock 'n' Roll Madrid Marathon is a prestigious event in Spain with IAAF Gold Label Road Race status. The course starts near Paseo de Recoletos, passing landmarks like Biblioteca Nacional de Espaa and Santiago Bernabu Stadium, before finishing inside Buen Retiro Park. The event expanded globally in April 2011. The 2020 edition was canceled due to the coronavirus pandemic, with registrants offered options for entry transfers or refunds.

programme.title: Road to UEFA EURO 2024
programme.desc: The UEFA EURO 2024 final tournament is scheduled to take place from 14 June to 14 July 2024.\nAs the host nation, Germany are seeded in Group A and will occupy position A1; they will therefore play in the opening match at the Munich Football Arena on Friday 14 June. Germany/West Germany have featured at every EURO since 1972. West Germany won the 1972 and 1980 editions, while the reunited Germany triumphed at EURO '96. The ten venues chosen to host games at the tournament include nine of the stadiums used at the 2006 World Cup plus the Dsseldorf Arena.

programme.title: Road to UEFA EURO 2024
programme.desc: The UEFA EURO 2024 final tournament is scheduled to take place from 14 June to 14 July 2024.\nAs the host nation, Germany are seeded in Group A and will occupy position A1; they will therefore play in the opening match at the Munich Football Arena on Friday 14 June. Germany/West Germany have featured at every EURO since 1972. West Germany won the 1972 and 1980 editions, while the reunited Germany triumphed at EURO '96. The ten venues chosen to host games at the tournament include nine of the stadiums used at the 2006 World Cup plus the Dsseldorf Arena.

programme.title: Have A Better Morning
programme.desc: Digging for solutions to accommodate the problems in the Arabian society.

programme.title: The Adventurer
programme.desc: Working in the press is full of dangers. A group of journalists and photographers narrates their hardest moments on the ground.

programme.title: If I Were With Them
programme.desc: Presenting the life and inspiring stories of the Companions with and after the Prophet Muhammad in an interesting and distinctive way.

programme.title: Popular Art Show
programme.desc: The most beautiful folk art, its artists, its heritage, and the pride of its people of it and its details.

programme.title: Cappuccino
programme.desc: Two waiters working in a cafe seeking to solve many problems and case through their work in a comic way. Salah Al Wafi, Mohammed Kahtan, Fedaa Abu Hamad, Malak Al Mahrasi, Anwar Al Macholi, Falah Al Jabouri, Mo'men AL Jaafari.

programme.title: If I Were With Them
programme.desc: Presenting the life and inspiring stories of the Companions with and after the Prophet Muhammad in an interesting and distinctive way.

programme.title: Youth Of Quran Contest
programme.desc: Strong competition between a number of young people who have memorized the Holy Qur'an to win and become the most one who has memorized and mastered the Qur'an.

programme.title: A Journey Of Luck
programme.desc: An interesting and fun competition program and some Yemeni artists may appear in some episodes to add suspense.

programme.title: Science And Civilization
programme.desc: Hosting symbols from science, literature, and history, each expert presents related subjects to enrich Moroccan citizens.

programme.title: The Last News
programme.desc: Astounding encounters with the top officials and news-makers to shed light on the latest news that affect all citizens.

programme.title: Mother's Satisfaction
programme.desc: A story of suffering, an educated young man is so tired of unemployment and that leads him to work in illegal jobs to find himself arrested in prison. But suddenly, he gets a chance of a new experience raises his social and financial life.

programme.title: Kolha O Tariqo
programme.desc: Ma'amoun, the head of the family, must preserve the family's peaceful and harmonious lifestyle by saving them from the various challenges and conflicts that arise, causing threats to their family as a whole.

programme.title: It Is Obvious
programme.desc: A Moroccan family lives in constant suffering because of its difficult financial conditions. Its members work in many professions in order to provide a decent life.

programme.title: Landmarks And Cities
programme.desc: Taking the audience on a magical ride to Morocco for the purpose of exploring its cities.

programme.title: Lost Hearts
programme.desc: Bawtesta falls in love with Anna after losing his wife, but unfortunately he discovers that her father works illegally which has killed his close friend.

programme.title: The Kingdom History
programme.desc: A twelve-episode documentary about the success of the Moroccan relations with the African countries.

programme.title: Thousand Greetings
programme.desc: The camera scours the Moroccan cities which differ in their nature to know more about their history, traditions, and most significant landmarks.

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: It discusses all family topics related to health and nutrition, in addition to talking about fashion trends and household tricks. It also addresses legal and financial issues that may concern the family.
